name: Descending (itch) (ElFroscho)
description:
Controls:

The submarine points into the direction your mouse points towards.

The submarine moves automatically. 

Press space to turn the light on/ off but watch out, or the battery will run out. 

Airbubbles supply you with oxygen, when you run out of it you die.

Bumping into walls also causes you to loose oxygen.

Press Escape to Pause the Game.

Objective:

You need to track down multiple treasures left inside a big cave, an arrow will point in the direction of it.

Each time you collect one, you loose oxygen faster and you need to bring it back to your base, located on the ocean surface. 

After you bring the latest treasure back, you need to look for a new one.

Credits:

Janos Paradi
